Blog.post: Well I think I have this all figured out now and I am tired. It is 4 in the morning after all! I got a little picture happy, can you tell. Off to sleep! Night
urlLink This is me and Jimmy. By the way, where have you been Jimmy, I MISS YOU!!! urlLink
urlLink This is my kitty, his name.....Mr. Kitty urlLink

....To this blogging thing. Funny thing is, one of my "friends" was doing this and we found it on the internet....and he was talking all kinds of crap about EVERYONE! So I guess I should stay away from talking about people! I don't quite get this yet or understand it's purpose, but why not give it a shot hey. So what does everyone write about? Feelings? What went on in the day? I guess I'll have a looksy around and see!

So here I am work, wanting so bad for it to be 5:00 so that I can go home. I usually don't get off until 6, but I had to come in early today to cover for someone else who isn't here. I am sooooo tired I can barely stay awake!! Bubbs and I were up pretty late talking about "us" and how all of this hurts me so much. And then I couldn't fall asleep until about 4:30am. My heart was beating so fast, I have no idea why?? Whatever. I want to leave work to go home, but don't want to because my dad will be there and he has been such a bug lately. Where's this, where's that? What are you doing? .....It is like being a defendent in a courtroom! Urg it bothers me!! Well I guess I better get back to my job, more typing!

Its late and I am all emotional. Me and the man have been going through some weird times lately and it is really taking its toll on me I think. I feel like I feel so much for him sometimes and I feel that he doesn't feel the same. It sucks! Sometimes I just wanna hear how he feels so I can feel like we are on the same page, I guess it would be kinda comforting. Well I need to go to bed, don't wanna be bitchy tomorrow! :-)

So James is a lying cheater! Turns out the whole time we were dating, he was STILL going out with his ex girlfriend of 6 years. She had no idea about me either, and the poor girl is only 18. She is gonna stay with him and work things out! I am still in so much shock! This all happened about 2 weeks ago, 4 days before he was to leave fot Wymoning for a year and a half. I am so glad though that I caught that cheating lying son of bitch! He was speachless! I slapped him across the face so hard!!! He lied to me EVERY SINGLE day, more than once, for the last 10 months, and I am so disgusted!! So if any of you women ever come across a man by the name of James Paul Adkins, stay away! He is the most selfish, heartless, lying bastard you will ever meet!!!
